Summary: Clear skies that day,object was slow moving, with a rotating wobble,no sound, high rate of speed at acceleration.
divs: Sighting DetailsHello I'm submiting this report for my brother..because he is unaware of the available resources for such events. I've spoken with him at great lenth and he has agreed to speak to someone as long as his identity would remain anonymous. He is very cautious of who he talks to because of the negative stigma that is associated with things like this. He knows I am a firm "believer", but still waited until 8:45pm to call ME. He doesn't want to become some media punching bag where he could possibly loose his job after being humiliated..he simply wants to know if there were any other similar reports in the area at that time. He knows what he saw ..and I believe him
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ashburn
There were no other sightings in Ashburn on or around April 6th 2011
